header.title: Work Visa Eligibility Screening
header.subtitle: Quick pre-qualification tool to determine your general eligibility for a U.S. work visa.

step1.heading: Basic Profile
step1.goalTemp: Work temporarily in the United States
step1.goalPerm: Work permanently and obtain a Green Card
step1.jobOfferLabel: Do you currently have a job offer from a U.S. employer?
step1.workCategoryLabel: What type of work are you seeking?
step1.goalTooltip: Select the option that best describes your immigration objective.
step1.jobOfferTooltip: A valid job offer from a U.S. employer is required for most work visa categories.
step1.workCategoryTooltip: The type of work determines which visa category may be appropriate.

step2.heading: Immigration History
step2.usTravelLabel: Have you ever been in the United States before?
step2.overstayLabel: Have you ever overstayed a visa in the U.S.?
step2.deportationLabel: Have you ever been deported or removed from the U.S.?
step2.visaDenialLabel: Have you ever been denied a U.S. visa?
step2.usTravelTooltip: Prior travel to the U.S. is not a disqualifier, but overstays or removals may affect eligibility.
step2.overstayTooltip: Overstaying a visa can trigger bars to reentry.
step2.deportationTooltip: Prior deportation or removal creates significant bars to immigration benefits.
step2.visaDenialTooltip: A prior visa denial does not necessarily disqualify you, but it will be considered.

step3.heading: Criminal History
step3.criminalLabel: Have you ever been arrested or convicted of a crime?
step3.criminalTooltip: Criminal history can affect visa eligibility. Minor traffic violations usually do not.
step3.offenseTooltip: Select the category that best describes the offense.

step4.heading: Work Qualifications
step4.experienceLabel: Do you have specialized job experience?
step4.yearsLabel: How many years of work experience do you have?
step4.educationTooltip: Education level helps determine which visa categories you may qualify for.
step4.experienceTooltip: Specialized experience in your field strengthens your visa application.
step4.yearsTooltip: Length of experience may qualify you for skilled worker visa categories.
